game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.description: In the ancient ruins of a forgotten civilization, there lies a powerful artifact rumored to grant immense power to its possessor. You have been hired to retrieve this artifact and bring it back to the quest giver.

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the ruins
task.description: The ruins are hidden deep in the jungle. You must navigate through treacherous terrain and overcome numerous obstacles to find the entrance.

task.objective: Find the key to unlock the inner chamber
task.description: The inner chamber, where the artifact is said to be hidden, is locked. You must find the key somewhere within the ruins to gain access.

task.objective: Defeat the guardians protecting the artifact
task.description: The artifact is guarded by powerful guardians who will stop at nothing to protect it. You must defeat them in battle to claim the artifact.
